summary: This document consists of Bureau of Prisons count sheets, inmate rosters, and out-count forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for July 24-25, 2019. It records inmate counts by housing unit and lists specific inmates, including one on suicide watch. The documents are routine prison administrative records from the period just before Jeffrey Epstein's death.

persons.name: Decapua
persons.context: Listed as an inmate (REG NO 16520-055) on the inmate roster, assigned to 'HOSP' (hospital) with a work code indicating 'SUICIDE ORD CCS' on July 24-25, 2019.

persons.name: Harrison
persons.context: Listed as an inmate (REG NO 57084-056) on the inmate roster, assigned as a 'TWN DRIVER' on July 25, 2019.

events.title: Daily inmate counts at MCC New York
events.description: Routine inmate counts were conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, showing a total census of 774 inmates across various housing units.

events.title: Inmate on suicide watch
events.description: Inmate Decapua (REG NO 16520-055) is listed on the inmate roster with an assignment code indicating 'SUICIDE ORD CCS' (Suicide Order Constant Care Status).

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: These are routine prison administrative documents (count sheets, rosters) from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York dated July 24-25, 2019.
Inmate Decapua (REG NO 16520-055) is listed as being on 'SUICIDE ORD CCS' (Suicide Order Constant Care Status) on these dates.
The total inmate census recorded across the facility's housing units was 774 on July 24-25, 2019.
The documents show standard prison procedures for tracking inmate location and status through unit counts and out-count forms.
